price: En el Paraíso no padecerás hambre ni te faltará con qué cubrir tu desnudez,
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعۡرَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna laka allā tajūʿa fīhā walā taʿrā
